title: Dream Time
author: Alex
citation: Alex. "Dream Time: experience with Calea Zacatechichi, Poppies - California, Lactuca - L. canadensis (Wild Lettuce) & Blue Vervain (ID 72305)". Erowid.org. Dec 22, 2008. erowid.org/exp/72305
substance: Calea Zacatechichi, Poppies - California, Lactuca - L. canadensis (Wild Lettuce) & Blue Vervain

report:
Sip Sip Sip

This is not the thing to have a good time, but rather like most reports state, just tastes bitter as fuck. It does however create a wonderful high that can make me fall asleep better and longer than any ambien I've taken. Maybe the day we start learning about these herbs is a day to enjoy.
